item.title: panicã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆ
item.description: Goã§ãƒ‘ãƒ‹ãƒƒã‚¯ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã™ã‚‹ã‹ã©ã†ã‹ã®ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã§ã™ã€‚ // Testing if testFunc calls panic. // e.g. // IsTestCallPanic(func(){ // <place test target here.> // }) func IsTestCallPanic(testFunc func()) (ok bool) { defer func() { if err := recover(); err == nil { ok = false } }() ok = true testFunc() return } // Test for test. func TestIsTestCallPanic(t *testing.T) { isCalled := IsTestCallPanic(func() { var i interface{} if i == nil { panic("Hi, panic.") } }) if !isCalled { t.Errorf("failed.") } }
